ch0245_40_mary/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Are you all ready to go?
ch0245_40_mary/0101_0701_02_10:
Don’t forget to bring plenty of water with you
on your adventure today!
ch0245_40_mary/7101_0701_01_10:
My Grimmsnarl’s hair is so strong, he could
overwhelm even the toughest Machamp!
ch0245_40_mary/7101_0701_02_10:
It does get tangled fairly easily though, so
keepin’ up with the groomin’ each day can
be a right pain.
ch0245_40_mary/7101_0701_03_10:
D’you want to give it a try? Just be careful not
to let his hair get snagged in the brush, all right?
ch0245_40_mary/7102_0701_01_10:
Me ’n’ Gloria both got these flower hair clips to
match each other.
ch0245_40_mary/7102_0701_02_10:
They’re so cute ’n’ colorful... They go really well
with our new outfits, don’t y’think?
ch0245_40_mary/7102_0701_03_10:
I’m gonna have to put on my best smile while
wearin’ this, or my outfit’ll outshine me!
ch0245_40_mary/7103_0701_01_10:
Well, look at you! I can tell you and your partner
have been trainin’ hard lately!
ch0245_40_mary/7103_0701_02_10:
I’m gonna cheer so hard for you out there today,
you won’t lose a single battle!
ch0245_40_mary/7103_0701_03_10:
Actually, hold that thought—I need to go and
grab some sunscreen first!
ch0245_40_mary/7104_0701_01_10:
Back in Spikemuth, I often used to hang out and
eat curry with the Team Yell lot.
ch0245_40_mary/7104_0701_02_10:
They all like to put in different berries, so the
flavor ended up a little different each time.
ch0245_40_mary/7104_0701_03_10:
Someday I’ll have to get you to try my own
special recipe! It’s so good—you’ll see!
ch0245_40_mary/7105_0701_01_10:
Oh! Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’ve got great timing!
ch0245_40_mary/7105_0701_02_10:
I was just gonna go for a swim! D’you wanna
join me?
ch0245_40_mary/7105_0701_03_10:
We can have a battle in the water while we’re
swimmin’! Bet you can’t beat me!
ch0245_40_mary/1701_0701_01_10:
Look what washed up on the shore this mornin’!
Here, it’s for you!
ch0245_40_mary/1701_0702_01_10:
Make sure you use it, OK? Don’t just hoard
it away!
ch0245_40_mary/2501_0701_01_10:
Hmm... Maybe if I just curve it upwards a bit
more on this side...
ch0245_40_mary/2501_0701_02_10:
Hi! Welcome to Dine-A-Ma— AAAAAH!
H-how long have you been standin’ there?!
Ugh, this is so embarrassing...
ch0245_40_mary/2501_0702_01_10:
I need to greet customers at the pop-up eatery
we set up on the beach, so I’ve been tryin’ to
practice my smile...
ch0245_40_mary/2501_0702_02_10:
Hey! Now that you’re in on my secret, could you
do me a big favor?
ch0245_40_mary/2501_0702_03_10:
Can you let me know how I’m doing so far?
Here goes...
Hi! W-welcome to Dine-A-Max!
ch0245_40_mary/2501_0702_04_10: Ugh...I can’t do this! It’s too embarrassing!
ch0245_40_mary/2511_0701_01_10:
I grew up in a place called Spikemuth. The north
side of town is right on the ocean, but it’s always
freezing cold.
ch0245_40_mary/2511_0701_02_10:
The beaches here on Pasio have been such a nice
change! While I’m here, I wanna spend as much
time in the water as I can!
ch0245_40_mary/2511_0702_01_10:
I haven’t got much practice swimmin’, so when I
go in the water, will you come with me?
ch0245_40_mary/2511_0702_02_10:
Don’t leave me alone out there, all right?
Promise!
ch0245_40_mary/3001_0701_01_10:
Seein’ how bright the sun is today has given me
loads more energy than usual! Can’t wait to
take on the rest o’ the day!
ch0245_40_mary/3003_0701_01_10:
Why don’t we go and find someplace cool to take
a break? This heat’s got me totally knackered.
ch0245_40_mary/3005_0701_01_10:
What’s kept you up so late? If you’re not off to
bed yet, we could have a quick battle or two.
